author: TMZ Staff
title: Kevin Spacey's Sexual Assault Accuser Commits Suicide - TMZ
description: A man who accused Kevin Spacey of sexually assaulting him -- once part of the Royal Family of Norway -- has committed suicide.
content:
A man who accused Kevin Spacey of sexually assaulting him -- once part of the Royal Family of Norway -- has committed suicide.
